paper_abstract: This paper presents a new Fuzzy Neural Network (FNN) model to evaluate design alternatives in conceptual design. In the proposed method, a fuzzy reasoning based on feedforward neural network is used to evaluate concepts, and a learning algorithm based on ranking-based adaptive evolutionary operator genetic algorithm (RAOGA) is utilized to adjust fuzzy weights and thresholds with fuzzy inputs and outputs in FNN.
paper_title: RAOGA-based fuzzy neural network model of design evaluation
